credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Pierrot Figure
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: In the form of a Pierrot figure, with small pointed hat, wide, saw-tooth edge collar, large buttons down front of baggy, one-piece costume, small pointed shoes; he has hands in pockets, pulling costume outward, exagerating his girth. Head and collar, hinged at back, flip open as lid. Link attached to upper part of right arm. Striker situated on reverse side, just beneath character's buttocks. Matchsafe may stand upright.
name: Matchsafe
